Read Johnson L3 bins

Read Johnson L3 bins

readchla_johnson(date, time.resolution = c("daily"), xylim = NULL,
  product = "MODISA", latest = FALSE, returnfiles = FALSE, ...,
  inputfiles = NULL)

Arguments

date

date/s to read
time.resolution

daily for now
xylim

extent in longitude latitude using 'raster::extent'
latest

return only the latest day
returnfiles

give the files instead of the data
...

ignored
inputfiles

speed up the read by inputting the files

Value

tibble of the values in L3 bin form

Details

relies on processing done here 'file.path(getOption("default.datadir"), "data_local/acecrc.org.au/ocean_colour")'

Examples

 x <- readchla_johnson(date = "2012-01-01")
 ##plot(roc::bin2lonlat(x$bin_num, 4320), col = palr::chlPal(x$chla_johnson), pch = ".")
